title: Tokmd Receipt
description: Output schema for tokmd (language, module, export, and analysis reports). Schema version 4.

LangReceipt.description: Output from `tokmd --format json` or `tokmd lang --format json`.

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the scan ran.

warnings.description: Any warnings generated during the scan.

with_files.description: Whether file counts were included (flattened from report).

top.description: Top N limit used (flattened from report).

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the scan ran.

warnings.description: Any warnings generated during the scan.

top.description: Top N limit used (flattened from report).

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the scan ran.

warnings.description: Any warnings generated during the scan.

ExportMeta.description: First line of JSONL export output (`tokmd export --format jsonl`).

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the scan ran.

warnings.description: Any warnings generated during the scan.

ExportRow.description: Data row in JSONL export output (lines 2+ of `tokmd export --format jsonl`).

path.description: Relative file path (normalized to forward slashes).

kind.description: Whether this is a physical file (parent) or embedded code block (child).

ToolInfo.description: Information about the tool that generated the receipt.

version.description: The version of the tool used.

ScanArgs.description: Configuration used for the file scan.

excluded_redacted.description: True if excluded patterns were redacted (replaced with hashes).

no_ignore.description: Whether all ignore files were disregarded.

no_ignore_parent.description: Whether parent ignore files were disregarded.

no_ignore_vcs.description: Whether VCS ignore files (.gitignore) were disregarded.

treat_doc_strings_as_comments.description: Whether doc strings were counted as comments.

LangArgsMeta.description: Arguments used for the language summary command.

top.description: Top N languages to show (0 = all).

ModuleArgsMeta.description: Arguments used for the module summary command.

top.description: Top N modules to show (0 = all).

ExportArgsMeta.description: Arguments used for the export command.

strip_prefix.description: Path prefix to strip from output paths.

strip_prefix_redacted.description: True if strip_prefix was redacted (replaced with a hash).

LangRow.description: A row in the language summary report.

bytes.description: Total file size in bytes for this language.

tokens.description: Estimated token count for this language.

ModuleRow.description: A row in the module summary report.

bytes.description: Total file size in bytes for this module.

tokens.description: Estimated token count for this module.

FileRow.description: A file row in the export data (used in ExportReceipt.rows).

path.description: Relative file path (normalized to forward slashes).

kind.description: Whether this is a physical file (parent) or embedded code block (child).

ChildrenMode.description: How embedded languages are handled in lang reports. 'collapse' merges into parent totals, 'separate' shows as distinct rows.

ChildIncludeMode.description: How embedded languages are handled in module/export reports. 'separate' includes child rows, 'parents-only' excludes them.

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the analysis ran.

warnings.description: Any warnings generated during the analysis.

export_path.description: Path to the export file if used as input.

base_receipt_path.description: Path to the base receipt if used.

export_schema_version.description: Schema version of the export file.

base_signature.description: Integrity hash of the base data.

AnalysisArgsMeta.description: Arguments used for the analyze command.

HistogramBucket.description: A histogram bucket for file sizes.

max.description: Maximum lines in bucket (null for unbounded).

TopOffenders.description: Top offender files by various metrics.

density_per_kloc.description: TODOs per thousand lines of code.

halstead.description: Halstead software science metrics (requires halstead feature).

MaintainabilityIndex.description: Composite maintainability index based on the SEI formula.

avg_loc.description: Average lines of code per file.

ComplexityHistogram.description: Histogram of cyclomatic complexity distribution across files.

counts.description: Count of files in each bucket.

FileComplexity.description: Complexity metrics for a single file.

function_count.description: Number of functions in the file.

max_nesting.description: Maximum nesting depth in this file.
Maximum nesting depth within the function.

CockpitReceipt.description: Output from `tokmd cockpit --format json`. Contains PR metrics for code review automation.

generated_at_ms.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the cockpit metrics were generated.

review_plan.description: Prioritized list of files to review.

trend.description: Trend comparison with baseline (if --baseline was provided).

TrendComparison.description: Trend comparison between current state and baseline.

baseline_available.description: Whether a baseline was successfully loaded.

baseline_path.description: Path to the baseline file used.

TrendMetric.description: A trend metric with current, previous, delta values.

files_increased.description: Number of files that got more complex.

files_decreased.description: Number of files that got less complex.

ChangeSurface.description: Change surface metrics for a PR.

commits.description: Number of commits in the PR.

change_concentration.description: Percentage of changes in top 20% of files.

Composition.description: File composition breakdown for changed files.

large_files_touched.description: Number of large files (>500 lines) being changed.

avg_file_size.description: Average file size in changed files.

HealthWarning.description: Health warning for a specific file.

hotspots_touched.description: Hotspot files touched by this PR.

bus_factor_warnings.description: Files with low bus factor being touched.

GateStatus.description: Status of a gate check. 'pass' = gate passed, 'fail' = gate failed, 'skipped' = no relevant files changed, 'pending' = results not available.

EvidenceSource.description: Source of evidence/gate results. 'ci_artifact' = downloaded from CI, 'cached' = found in local cache, 'ran_local' = executed locally.

CommitMatch.description: Commit match quality for evidence. 'exact' = matches HEAD, 'partial' = covers merge base, 'stale' = different commit, 'unknown' = could not determine.

relevant.description: Files in scope for the gate.

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

timeout.description: Number of mutations that timed out.

MutationSurvivor.description: A mutation that survived testing (escaped detection).

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

UncoveredHunk.description: An uncovered code hunk in diff coverage.

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

BreakingChange.description: A breaking change detected by semver check.

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

advisory_db_version.description: Version of the advisory database used.

evidence_commit.description: SHA this evidence was generated for.

evidence_generated_at_ms.description: Timestamp when evidence was generated (ms since epoch).

reason.description: Reason for including in review plan.

Envelope.description: Ecosystem envelope for multi-sensor integration. Provides a standardized JSON format for integrating with external orchestrators.

Verdict.description: Overall verdict for the envelope. Directors aggregate verdicts: fail > pending > warn > pass > skip.

Finding.description: A finding reported by the tool. Uses (check_id, code) tuple for identity, forming (tool, check_id, code) triple with tool.name.

fingerprint.description: Stable identity fingerprint (BLAKE3 hash of tool_name, check_id, code, location.path) for deduplication.

docs_url.description: Documentation URL for this finding type.

FindingSeverity.description: Severity level for findings. 'error' blocks merge (hard gate failure), 'warn' is review recommended, 'info' is informational.

GateItem.description: Individual gate item in the gates envelope.

reason.description: Reason for the status (especially for pending/fail).

artifact_path.description: Path to the source artifact (if applicable).

ComplexityBaseline.description: Complexity baseline for tracking trends over time. Used by the ratchet system to enforce that complexity metrics do not regress across commits.

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this baseline was generated.

commit.description: Git commit SHA at which this baseline was captured, if available.

files.description: Per-file baseline entries for granular tracking.

BaselineMetrics.description: Aggregate baseline metrics for the entire codebase.

total_code_lines.description: Total lines of code across all files.

avg_cyclomatic.description: Average cyclomatic complexity across all functions.

max_cyclomatic.description: Maximum cyclomatic complexity found in any function.

avg_cognitive.description: Average cognitive complexity across all functions.

max_cognitive.description: Maximum cognitive complexity found in any function.

avg_nesting_depth.description: Average nesting depth across all functions.

max_nesting_depth.description: Maximum nesting depth found in any function.

FileBaselineEntry.description: Per-file baseline entry for granular complexity tracking.

code_lines.description: Lines of code in this file.

max_nesting.description: Maximum nesting depth in this file.

function_count.description: Number of functions in this file.

content_hash.description: BLAKE3 hash of file content for change detection.

DeterminismBaseline.description: Build determinism baseline for reproducibility verification. Tracks hashes of build artifacts and source inputs.

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this baseline was generated.

build_hash.description: Hash of the final build artifact.

source_hash.description: Hash of all source files combined.

cargo_lock_hash.description: Hash of Cargo.lock if present (Rust projects).
